::Hot Rod::

He moved back from the battle, waiting to see if his shots would hit. He
also took the time to rest. This worthless battle was going on too long.

::DrillBit/KitKat2::

They walked down the hall as DrillBit opened a comm to Killfest.
"Hey where are you?"

::Epyon::

In the workout room, he fought off several holo apponants. He would be
ready for IGL.
